titles: The zealovs Christian taking heaven by holy violence in severall sermons, tending to direct men how to hear with zeal, [how] to pray with importunity / preached by ... Mr. Christopher Love ...
author: Love, Christopher, 1618-1651.

notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
